oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-08-14 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-08-14 part 1. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring Ann Cole, the Four Fellows, and the Cleftones. Produced and transcribed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sam "The Man" Taylor; Big Al Sears; Four Fellows; Ann Cole
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement (Alan Freed) -- Opening statement (Bern Bennett) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor, Big Al Sears, and the orchestra -- The Teen Rock (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra, Big Al Sears tenor saxophone) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces the Four Fellows -- I Sit In My Window (Four Fellows) -- Alan Freed introduces the Four Fellows -- Soldier Boy (Four Fellows) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Ann Cole -- I've Got A Little Boy (Ann Cole) -- Alan Freed introduces Ann Cole -- Easy, Easy, Baby (Ann Cole)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Sears, Al, 1910-1990; Cole, Ann, 1934-; Four Fellows; Cleftones (Musical group); Melamed, Louis
